Spark Summit is organized by Databricks and will bring together more than 1,200 developers, data scientists, analysts, researchers, and business professionals from around the world. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to connect with, and learn from, prominent experts in the Spark community. Spark Summit Europe – Big Ideas About Big Data- KDnuggets Offer

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Apache Spark, Big Data, Databricks, Dublin, Summit

Spark Summit will bring together more than 1,200 developers, data scientists, analysts, researchers, and business pros from around the world. Reg by Aug 25 to catch early bird rates and save extra 15% w. code KD824.


BE PART OF EUROPE'S LARGEST EVENT FOR THE APACHE SPARK COMMUNITY

Apache Spark has rapidly become the analytics platform of choice for leading companies, from Netflix and BMW to LinkedIn and Shell, and demand for Spark talent is at an all-time high. Arm yourself with the expertise you need to succeed by joining us at Spark Summit Europe 2017, October 24-26 in Dublin, Ireland. Sign up now and save 15% off your registration with this promo code: KD824.

Spark Summit is organized by Databricks and will bring together more than 1,200 developers, data scientists, analysts, researchers, and business professionals from around the world. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to connect with, and learn from, prominent experts in the Spark community. You'll discover new techniques, receive hands-on training and learn about proven best practices from top production users.

The action-packed program has over 70 sessions in 9 different tracks to choose from, including Developer, Data Science, Enterprise, AI and Streaming. Plus, if you register before midnight PDT tomorrow (August 25) you can still take advantage of early bird pricing. Remember to use promo code KD824 to save an additional 15% off the early bird rate!

p.s. Can't make it to Dublin for Spark Summit Europe? Sign up for our mailing list to be notified when registration opens for other upcoming events like Spark Summit East in February 2018.

Apache, Apache Spark, Spark and the Spark logo are trademarks of the Apache Software Foundation. The Apache Software Foundation has no affiliation with, and does not endorse or review the materials provided at this event, which is managed by Databricks.
